name: 下一层的封魔塔 Forever War
name_original: 下一层的封魔塔 Forever War
description:
The world's greatest warriors set out for the tower!
Start your expedition! Defeat those cute enemies who suddenly appear in front of you! Or be frightened by treasures and your amazing luck! Game Features:
·Pixel style world composition
A horizontal version of the pixel world, including towns and towers, shows a unique artistic style.

· Layer-by-level adventure challenges
Go to the Enchanted Tower to receive endless exploration challenges, defeat every enemy on every floor and challenge the leader to save the world.

· Rich activities
Go to the tower to fight, go fishing on the river, or go to the luck house to earn more money. There are a lot of things you can do in the game.
